fields.name: Setup the joint for soldering
fields.value: Heat part and the associated pad for 2 - 3 seconds.

fields.name: Add solder to the pad
fields.value: Add solder to the pad and make sure not to touch the solder or the pad.

fields.name: Continue Heating
fields.value: Continue adding heat to the pad for 1 - 2 seconds.

fields.name: Let the joint cool down
fields.value: Let the joint cool down and DO NOT touch or blow on the joint or the pad.

fields.name: Remove the solder
fields.value: Remove the solder from the pad and DO NOT touch or blow on the joint or the pad.

fields.name: Clean the joint
fields.value: Clean the joint with a damp cloth or a dry cloth.

fields.name: Clean the pad
fields.value: Clean the pad with a damp cloth or a dry cloth.
